ingredients.item: ½ x 175g pack baby corn, halved lengthways
200g can butter beans, drained and rinsed
1½ tbsp aged balsamic & olive oil dressing

instructions.step: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a frying pan and fry the vegetables and beans for 5 minutes, covered, until just tender. Add the soft cheese and dressing, and heat through.
Meanwhile, heat the remaining oil in a small frying pan and fry the breadcrumbs for 3-4 minutes until golden and crispy. Sprinkle over the vegetables, and serve.
